about_the_game:
Particular qualities


Play an adventure visual novel where a serious plot blends with toilet humor.

Choice given to the player allows the main character to progress through various plot directions.

Enjoy splendid animation and cartoonish comic-style graphics of the game.

Voiced by real characters intensify immersion into the plot.

Utilize found items in the game to access initially inaccessible areas.

Roguelike elements intensify interest in completing the game the right way, as every time you die, the game starts anew.

What is the game about?


The life of simple Skuf is like a rollercoaster: cozy confinement, whiskey galore, and all that jazz. But what's the big deal that could ruin this party? The twist: gotta save the world from the booze virus. Him - being the real deal, like a messiah - totally brushes it off. 'Cause behind bars, he's already in his element, being a booze hound and an outsider. How to get him off his butt and start battling the virus? The riddle lies with Durovchello, the dude who's saved the world multiple times and rocks it in his streams.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains profanity, scenes of alcohol consumption, the use of fictitious dangerous pills, as well as scenes with hints of sexual intercourse
